level.heading: Certain defective deeds and acknowledgments prior to January 1, 1969, validated; acknowledgments by married women - prior to April 10, 1869; same - when validates defective power of attorney; validation of deeds made without acknowledgment prior to January 1, 1902; Acts of Congress and Acts of Maryland cumulative as to deeds prior to January 1, 1902.
Legislative History of Law 10-110
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-110, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-101.
